title: Adidas’ iconic Samba sneakers on a rare sale with up to 40% off
description: Snag a pair of Adidas Samba sneakers in a super rare up to 40% off deal we don't see come around too often. But these deals are selling out fast
content:
In a rare deal, Adidas actually has its iconic Samba sneakers on sale and we’re just as surprised as you.

Adidas is offering up to 40% off select Samba styles that’ll snag you a pair for as low as $72.

The sale is offer discounts on the Samba OG Sporty & Rich Shoes with only a few sizes still available. This $120 sneaker is marked down 40% off in a sporty cloud white/night indigo/collegiate red colorway.

You can grab the Charlotte FC x Black Sheep Samba ADV Shoes in more sizes for 30% off. This sneaker typically retails for $110 and is reduced in a sleek skateboarding-inspired core black/cloud white/ice blue color option.

We also dug up a deal on the Samba Germany Indoor Soccer Shoes for 20% off. Offered in a cloud white/off white/almost yellow color, this German soccer classic is usually priced at $100.

While these are the only three Samba sneakers, Adidas currently has on sale, you can still snag more famous Samba styles in an assortment of colors for $100-$150, depending on design. But if you’re look for a deal on the shoe, the previously mentioned sneakers are a sure bet to save some money.

Here’s where you can score the best Samba sneaker discounts and more Samba OG styles from Adidas.
• None for $72, instead of $120 Samba OG Sporty & Rich Shoes for $72, instead of $120
• None for $77, instead of $110 Charlotte FC x Black Sheep Samba ADV Shoes for $77, instead of $110
• None for $80, instead of $100 Samba Germany Indoor Soccer Shoes for $80, instead of $100

If you’re looking for even more Adidas sneakers on sale, you can check out these new markdowns now:
• None for $84, instead of $120 Gazelle Bold Shoes for $84, instead of $120
• None for $57, instead of $75 VL Court 3.0 Shoes for $57, instead of $75
• None for $77, instead of $110 Campus 00s Shoes for $77, instead of $110
• None for $135, instead of $180 Ultraboost 1.0 Shoes for $135, instead of $180
• None for $53, instead of $75 Cloudfoam Pure Shoes for $53, instead of $75

Our journalism needs your support. Please subscribe today to NJ.com.

Dawn Magyar can be reached at dmagyar@njadvancemedia.com. Have a tip? Tell us at nj.com/tips/.
summary: Adidas is offering up to 40% off select Samba styles, with only a few sizes still available. The Samba OG Sporty & Rich Shoes are marked down 40% in a sporty cloud white/night indigo/collegiate red colorway, while the Charlotte FC x Black Sheep Samba ADV Shoes are 30% off. While these are the only three Samba sneakers currently on sale, you can still buy more iconic Samba designs in an array of colors for $100-$150.
shortSummary: Adidas is offering up to 40% discounts on its iconic Samba sneakers, including one for $72 and others for $135/180.

Fresh off the heels of the popular Peanuts Collection, the Vera Bradley Outlet has a new standout collaboration, and it’s getting everyone ready for spooky season.
The Peanuts Halloween Collection features everyday favorite styles in a lighthearted Snoopy-adorned pattern. The belt bag and accompanying accessories are still in stock.
While some items are already sold out, the main remaining items feature the Large Cube Belt Bag, a favorite of mine, thanks to its adjustable strap and compact design.
The indigo-shaded purse sits comfortably across your shoulders with a wearable crossbody and a large zip compartment for all storage needs.
Adorned with Snoopy, Woodstock, Charlie Brown and friends, the pattern calls the Great Pumpkin to mind immediately.
Whether you use the purse to carry around excess trick-or-treat treats for the kids or bring it with you to a haunted house or fall fair, the Halloween-themed Peanuts pattern inspires nostalgia in the best way.
Decorate the already festive bag with an extra bit of Snoopy-mania by attaching the Peanuts Bag Charm.
It’s decked out with a bat version of Snoopy, an accompanying Woodstock and an on-theme jack-o-lantern.
Turn any wallet into a wristlet with the wristlet strap, now available at the Vera Bradley Outlet.
The limited-edition collection features fan-favorite prints at slashed price points. Plus, a new and exclusive blanket design is arriving soon.
Excluding new collections, the outlet is currently offering up to 70% off sitewide on back-to-school backpacks, lunch boxes and totes.
Check out the remaining Peanuts Halloween Collection
- Peanuts Outlet Large Cube Belt Bag for $25
- Peanuts Outlet Bag Charm for $20
- Peanuts Outlet Wide Wristlet Strap for $15
The Best Deals to Shop in August
- Amazon has the 2025 Apple iPad Air on sale for its cheapest price ever — get $150 off
- Adidas’ iconic Samba sneakers on a rare sale with up to 40% off
- Walmart has cheap deals on grills, patio furniture & fire pits before Labor Day, up to 65% off or more

If you've been trying to hunt down the elusive Milwaukee Packout cooler, we've found it in stock at Walmart. Plus, you can grab it at a discount — but hurry before it sells out again
Hey Dude is having a secret sneaker sale with up to 40% off — but for 1 day only
Hey Dude is dropping a huge secret sale on its famous Wendy & Wally sneakers that'll have you racing to grab a pair. Here's how to get up to 40% off while you can for only day only.
Le Creuset is retiring this popular color from its lineup, but it’s on sale for 20% off first
Take 20% off the turquoise cast-iron cookware line while it's still available, as the bright color option is retiring soon with Dutch Ovens, skillets and bundles now on sale
Away is finally restocking a fan-favorite color that had over 40K on the waitlist. Here’s when to get it first
Away fans have been begging for a Blush Pink return, and it's finally happening. Get ready for the drop on Aug. 12.
HOKA is having a secret sale on the Clifton 9 sneaker — here’s how to get the rare discount
HOKA dropped a big surprise for Clifton fans! Now you can get a rare 20% off the popular sneaker with this special deal. Shop it here.
Traeger’s new Flatrock griddles are so hot, they just might make you replace your Blackstone
Looking to take your griddle cooking to another level? Traeger's new Flatrock griddles are heating up and ready to sizzle against its famous Blackstone rival.
Amazon has the Ninja Swirl on sale in a first-time-ever deal no one saw coming
Summer's nowhere near over, but if you've hit your ice cream shop quota already, Amazon has you covered.
Wayfair’s limited-time clearout sale ends soon — save up to 84% off furniture, bedding, outdoor finds & more
Wayfair's currently running a 72-Hour Clearout Sale where you can save upwards of 80% off everything you need for your home, inside and out. Shop furniture, bedding, mattresses, rugs, patio finds, appliances and more today.
Walmart secretly dropped the Mickey Mouse Clubhouse+ playset ahead of its Fall 2025 release — get it here
Littles who are loving the new series can watch it on Disney+ and play with new characters included in this show-inspired playset.
9 sales you missed this week from HOKA, Walmart, Le Creuset & Amazon
Keeping track of every sale is a chore — that's why we did it for you. Check out 9 sales you may have missed this week, including deals on HOKA sneakers, Le Creuset's end-of-summer sale and the best moving bags for dormers.

Want to blow the whistle on government corruption or corporate wrongdoing? Have sensitive information or know something that needs to be investigated? See breaking news in your town?
We need your help.
Good tips are specific (rather than a hunch or theory) and newsworthy (affecting a large group of people, not a personal dispute). They also come with evidence, such as proof or documentation of what’s happening.
Have something you want to share?
No communication is completely secure, but these tools and suggestions can help protect your anonymity. IMPORTANT: These are intended only for news tips. Questions about circulation, advertising or general inquiries should be directed here.
PHONE
Our tip line can be reached 24/7 by phone or regular text message. Leave a voicemail with relevant details, and any contact information you wish to share. If you’re concerned about remaining anonymous, consider calling from a pay phone, or using a prepaid “burner” phone purchased with cash, or use one of the more secure text messaging options below.
Call us: +1 848-666-0164
POSTAL MAIL
One of the most secure forms of sending us information remains dropping an anonymous packet of information in the mail. We recommend sending mail from a public mailbox and not a post office or your home.
Mail us: NJAM Tips P.O. Box 469 Iselin, NJ 08830
TEXTING / SIGNAL
A free app with end-to-end encryption, meaning the content of messages and calls can only be read by you or your intended recipient. Messages can also be set to automatically delete from sending and receiving phone after a certain period of time. You must register a phone number, so if you’re concerned about additional anonymity, consider using a prepaid “burner” smartphone purchased with cash. You must add our number to your contacts before messaging, so use a fake name for the entry, and we’ll do the same.
Add us: +1 848-666-0164
DOWNLOAD | INSTRUCTIONS | SECURITY
EMAIL / PGP
You can always send us a regular, unsecure email. Regular email can be traced and tracked, and we highly recommend using the encryption option below, or a free ProtonMail account.
To send us a secure email message, use PGP encryption. Add this feature to any web-based email account (such as GMail, Yahoo! Mail, etc.) by downloading the Mailvelope extension for your browser. Here’s a step-by-step guide and a helpful video to get you going.
Write us: tips@njadvancemedia.com Securely: See our public PGP key here
DOWNLOAD | INSTRUCTIONS | SECURITY
PROTONMAIL
Alternatively, you can create a free ProtonMail account. This operates like any other email service but encrypts message contents. Sign up requires a username and password, so don’t use any identifying information. Once you have an account, you can communicate with us.
Write us: NJAMtips@protonmail.com
TOR BROWSER
As an additional layer of security, you can download the Tor browser, which helps mask your location and the computer you’re using while on the internet.
To see all of our investigative journalism, visit projects.nj.com

Walmart is dropping unheard of deals on those last-minute backyard essentials you still need for Labor Day cookout.
You can grab discounts up to 65% off grills, patio sets, fire pits and more with Flash Deals and Clearance markdowns offering more savings.
The outdoor cooking deals that Walmart has are really heating up. You can save on Blackstone griddles, Weber grills, Nexgrill barrel grills and smokers and tabletop griddles.
Grab this Weber Jumbo Joe Portable Charcoal Grill for tailgate season for under $100, or go big with this Blackstone Iron Forged 4-Burner Griddle for $225 off.
If you need a patio set, the discounts that Walmart is offering are unbelievable no matter what size set you’re looking for. It has this Costway 3-Piece Bistro Set for $109 off and this ECOPATIO 7-Piece Patio Conversation Set is marked down a whopping $937 off.
There’s also exceptional deals on fire pits to take you into fall with sale prices as low as on propane gas and wood-burning models.
Plus, many of these Walmart patio deals include free shipping fast, so you won’t have to pay extra for delivery.
Shop big discounts on grills, patio sets & more at Walmart

Say goodbye to Caribbean Blue, one of Le Creuset’s brightest summer colors, as the shade is retiring from the normal lineup.
Grab the iconic cookware line at a 20% discount before it goes. With a rare sale on popular styles including Dutch ovens, braisers, skillets and more, Caribbean blue is selling out quickly in every style.
If you love this turquoise shade and want to collect the entire lineup, now is your time, with extra slashed prices available to shop.
The 7.25-quart Signature Round Dutch Oven in the striking colorway is now $92 cheaper than any other hue, a slight positive in light of the retirement news.
The five-star Dutch Oven adds a sweet, breezy feel to any stovetop and serves up large parties alike in the iconic enameled cast-iron finish.
Now available for under $400, the highly recommended design has been earning rave reviews for years and there’s no telling if it will come back in stock.
If you’re searching for a reason to grab the vibrant colorway, this is it.
The Signature Round Dutch Oven is also available on Amazon and the Silicone Craft Series Utensil Set is at its lowest price this month.
Shop the full Caribbean Blue Le Creuset lineup

Finally, Walmart has the always sold-out Milwaukee Packout XL Cooler in stock and you can grab it on sale in this “cool” deal.
The Milwaukee Packout XL Cooler is on sale for $267, instead of $299, for a savings of $33 off.
This $33 discount is an added bonus on this Packout Cooler as it’s hard enough to find in stock at Walmart much less at a discount.
With this Packout Cooler, you’ll have extra large 40-quart capacity that can hold ice for up to five days. Pack your lunch in it or a few frosty beverages and roll this handy cooler, along with your tools to the jobsite or the beach.
In this configuration, the Milwaukee Packout Cooler comes with a cutting board for food prep, interior storage tray, built-in bottle opener and a divider to separate food and drinks. It also has an easy-to-empty drain plug, is water resistant, dust resistant and impact resistant for added durability.
This Packout Cooler fits snuggly on Milwaukee’s other Packout systems, so you can add it to your wheeled tool organizer with ease. You can also pick up this Milwaukee Packout Radio & Bluetooth Speaker for $404 to stack with the cooler for a true party on wheels or use this cooler all on its own.
Walmart is offering this Milwaukee Packout XL Cooler with free shipping as soon as Friday, if you order now.
You can also check out more Milwaukee tools and gear on sale from Walmart, including big discounts on these bestselling power tools:
- Milwaukee M18 FUEL 4-1/2″ / 5″ Cordless Grinder for $139, instead of $229
- Milwaukee M18 FUEL 18V Brushless 1/4″ Hex Impact Driver for $126, instead of $179
- Milwaukee M18 FUEL 1/2″ Mid-Torque Impact Wrench for $179, instead of $249
- Milwaukee USB-Rechargeable Rover Pivoting LED Flood Light for $53, instead of $61
- Milwaukee M18 REDLITHIUM XC 5.0Ah 18V Battery Pack – 2-Pack for $115, instead of $269

argos_summary: Adidas is offering a rare sale on its iconic Samba sneakers, with discounts of up to 40% off on select styles, bringing prices down to as low as $72. Featured deals include the Samba OG Sporty & Rich Shoes for $72, Charlotte FC x Black Sheep Samba ADV Shoes for $77, and Samba Germany Indoor Soccer Shoes for $80. Additionally, other Adidas sneakers are also on sale, with significant markdowns on various models.
